title: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: The item is a beautifully crafted spear, combining elegance with lethal functionality. Its shaft, long and slender, is adorned with intricate engravings that reflect its ancient heritage. At the top, a striking ornament features a central eye motif, symbolizing vigilance and wisdom, surrounded by sharp, stylized branches that evoke a sense of nature's fierce power. The spear's tip is finely honed, designed for precision strikes against foes. This weapon is not only a tool of battle but also a piece of art, embodying the spirit of a skilled warrior and serving as a powerful symbol in any warriorâ€™s arsenal.
